creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: Skirt of blue-black silk with 5-clawed dragon border and medallions brocaded in chartreuse yellow.  Around the bottom a band of gold and black brocade of interlocking Y pattern.  The skirt is pleated with stitched box pleats below the waist band.  Cf. 42.8.205,212 for similar tailoring and design.
title: Skirt
